visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.assessmentId = {assessmentId} and n.executionId = {executionId} and n.kpiId={kpiId} RETURN  n.completionDateEpochTime as completionDateEpochTime, n.Productivity as Productivity ORDER BY n.completionDateEpochTime DESC
